ptolemy.backtrack.eclipse.plugin.editor

Class PtolemyEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompilationUnitEditor
      • ptolemy.backtrack.eclipse.plugin.editor.PtolemyEditor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiPageCompilationUnitEditor

    public class PtolemyEditor
extends CompilationUnitEditor
    Editor with Ptolemy semantic highlighting. Ptolemy syntax highlighting is added to Eclipse's Java syntax highlighting as an extension.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 5.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Thomas Feng
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (tfeng)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (tfeng)

      • reconciled

        public void reconciled(org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.CompilationUnit ast,
                       boolean forced,
                       org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor progressMonitor)
        Notify all the reconciling listeners after reconciliation is performed.
        Parameters:
        ast - The compilation unit of the Java source.
        forced - Whether the reconciliation is forced.
        progressMonitor - The progress monitor to handle the reconcilation progress.
